TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CreateUserErrorEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserError> event is raised when an attempt to create a new user with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control fails. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs> class provides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs.CreateUserError%2A> property to indicate the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus> enumeration value that corresponds to the error that occurred.
## Examples In the following example, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserError> event is raised, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs.CreateUserError%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs> object is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control, `Label1`, to provide information on why the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserError> event occurred.
[!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs/CS/createuserwizarderror.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs/VB/createuserwizarderror.vb#2)]
The following is the .aspx file that can be used to run the preceding example.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs.CreateUserError%2A> property indicates the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus> enumeration value that corresponds to the error that occurred during the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatingUser> event.
## Examples The following example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserError> event to display the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs.CreateUserError%2A> property value in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control, `Label1`. For an .aspx file that can be used to run the example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs> topic.
[!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs/CS/createuserwizarderror.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs/VB/createuserwizarderror.vb#2)]
